paper_abstract: In this paper, we define the conditional Renyi entropy and show that the so-called chain rule holds for the Renyi entropy. Then, we introduce a relation for the rate of Renyi entropy and use it to derive the rate of the Renyi entropy for an irreducible-aperiodic Markov chain. We also show that the bound for the Renyi entropy rate is simply the Shannon entropy rate. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Some properties of Renyi entropy and Renyi entropy rate
